core.log_level.label: Log level

core.permission.value.label: Permission
core.permission.value.tooltip: Who is able to use the bot in general

core.permission.info.label: Permission info
core.permission.info.tooltip:
This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.
Use user, rank or tier

core.all_keyword.label: All keyword
core.all_keyword.tooltip: Keyword to indicate the user wants to gamble all of his currency

core.disclaimer.enable.label: Disclaimer enable
core.disclaimer.enable.tooltip: Whether or not to require acknowledgment of the gambling disclaimer before gambling

core.disclaimer.via_whisper.label: Disclaimer via whisper
core.disclaimer.via_whisper.tooltip: Whether or not to conclude disclaimer acknowledgement via whisper message

core.text.help.value: Available commands: {gamble.command}, {guess.command}, {d20.command}. For more information on a command type {core.help.command} [keyword]. To view the disclaimer type {core.disclaimer.command}.
core.text.help.label: Help text
core.text.help.tooltip:
Help text shown when using the help command.
Available formats are:
	{gamble.command} (gamble command),
	{guess.command} (guess command),
	{d20.command} (d20 command),
	{core.help.command} (help command),
	{core.disclaimer.command} (disclaimer command)

core.text.no_permission.value: You have no permission to use the commands, {user}.
core.text.no_permission.label: No permission text
core.text.no_permission.tooltip:
Text shown when user attempts to use the bot without permission to do so.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.no_command_permission.value: You have no permission to use the {keyword} command, {user}.
core.text.no_command_permission.label: No command permission text
core.text.no_command_permission.tooltip:
Text shown when user attempts to use a command without permission to do so.
Available formats are:
	{keyword} (the keyword the user tried to use),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.command_disable.label: Command disable text
core.text.command_disable.tooltip:
Text shown when user attempts to use disabled command.
Available formats are:
	{keyword} (the keyword the user tried to use),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.malformed_command.value: I did not get that, {user}. Type {core.help.command} for help and try again.
core.text.malformed_command.label: Malformed command text
core.text.malformed_command.tooltip:
Text shown when user tries to use the bot but the command is not recognized.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{core.help.command} (help command)

core.text.not_enough_currency.value: You don't have enough {currency} to do this, {user}.
core.text.not_enough_currency.label: Not enough currency text
core.text.not_enough_currency.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble more than he owns.
Available formats are:
	{currency} (currency name),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.not_acknowledged.value: I'm sorry {user} but you need to accept the disclaimer first to {gamble.keyword} or {guess.keyword}. Type {core.disclaimer.command} to display it.
core.text.not_acknowledged.label: Disclaimer not acknowledged text
core.text.not_acknowledged.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble before acknowledging the disclaimer.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{gamble.keyword} (gamble keyword),

	{guess.keyword} (guess keyword),

	{core.disclaimer.command} (disclaimer command)

core.text.disclaimer_via_whisper.value: You need to send this message via whisper, {user}
core.text.disclaimer_via_whisper.label: Disclaimer via whisper message
core.text.disclaimer_via_whisper.tooltip:
Text shown when disclaimer via whisper is enable but user tries to use those commands in stream chat.
Available formats:
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.disclaimer.value: Gambling can be addictive. Play responsibly. Underage gambling is an offence. Type {core.acknowledge.command} to acknowledge this disclaimer.
core.text.disclaimer.label: Disclaimer
core.text.disclaimer.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble more than he owns.
Available formats are:
	{core.acknowledge.command} (command to acknowledge the disclaimer)

core.text.disclaimer_disable.label: Disclaimer disable text
core.text.disclaimer_disable.tooltip:
Text shown when a user tries to gamble more than he owns.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.acknowledged.label: Acknowledged text
core.text.acknowledged.tooltip:
Text shown when a user acknowledges the disclaimer.
Available formats are:
	{gamble.keyword} (gamble keyword),
	{guess.keyword} (guess keyword),
	{user} (mentions the user)

core.text.twitch_bug.value: Please close the whisper chat with the 'X' and reopen it after replying to see new messages from me (that's a nice twitch but isn't it?).
core.text.twitch_bug.label: Twitch whisper bug text
core.text.twitch_bug.tooltip: Text appended to all whisper messages as this is a twitch bug and quite annoying

gamble.enable.tooltip: Whether or not the gamble command is enabled

gamble.permission.value.label: Gamble permission
gamble.permission.value.tooltip: Who is able to use the gamble command

gamble.text.win.value: Roll was {roll}. {user} wins {payout} {currency} and has {total} {currency} now.
gamble.text.win.label: Gamble win text
gamble.text.win.tooltip:
Text shown when a user wins a gamble.
Available formats are:
	{roll} (the gamble roll),
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{payout} (the winnings)
	{currency} (currency name)
	{total} (users total currency)

gamble.text.lose.value: Roll was {roll}. {user} loses {loss} {currency} and has {total} {currency} now.
gamble.text.lose.label: Gamble lose text
gamble.text.lose.tooltip:
Text shown when a user loses a gamble.
Available formats are:
	{roll} (the gamble roll),
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{loss} (the loss)
	{currency} (currency name)
	{total} (users total currency)

gamble.text.help.value: Type {gamble.command} [amount] to gamble. Chances to win are {gamble.chance}%
gamble.text.help.label: Gamble help text
gamble.text.help.tooltip:
Gamble help text.
Available formats are:
	{gamble.command} (gamble command),
	{gamble.chance} (chance to win when gambling)

gamble.chance.label: Gamble winning chance
gamble.chance.tooltip: Chance to win when gambling in percent

guess.enable.label: Guess enable
guess.enable.tooltip: Whether or not the guess command is enabled

guess.permission.value.label: Guess permission
guess.permission.value.tooltip: Who is able to use the guess command

guess.permission.info.label: Guess permission info
guess.permission.info.tooltip:
This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.
Use user, rank or tier

guess.text.win.value: {user}'s guess ({guess}) was right! He wins {payout} and has {total} {currency} now.
guess.text.win.label: Guess win text
guess.text.win.tooltip:
Text shown when a user guesses right.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{guess} (the guessed number),
	{payout} (the winnings)
	{total} (users total currency)
	{currency} (currency name)

guess.text.lose.value: {user}\'s guess ({guess}) was wrong, roll was {roll}! He looses {loss} and has {total} {currency} now.
guess.text.lose.label: Guess lose text
guess.text.lose.tooltip:
Text shown when a user guesses wrong.
Available formats are:
	{user} (mentions the user),
	{guess} (the guessed number),
	{roll} (the rolled number)
	{loss} (the loss)
	{total} (users total currency)
	{currency} (currency name)

guess.text.help.value: Type {guess.command} [guess] [amount] to guess. [guess] must be between 0 and {guess.max_val}
guess.text.help.label: Guess help text
guess.text.help.tooltip:
Guess help text.
Available formats are:
	{guess.command} (guess command),
	{guess.max_val} (the maximum possible number)

guess.max_val.label: Guess max value
guess.max_val.tooltip: Maximum value that can be rolled when guessing
